Name: THEME
Explanation: A DESCRIPTION, IN FREE TEXT IN PLAIN LANGUAGE OR CODES, OF THE OVERRIDING INTENT OF A PARTICULAR ACTIVITY.

Name: AIRCRAFT ACTIVITY
Explanation: DATA ITEMS FOR FUDN 012 CONTAINED IN AD 80-50 ANNEX I, AND MARREP.

Name: TYPE OF SCREEN
Explanation: THE NAME OR CODE OF A SPECIFIC TYPE OF SCREEN OR DISPOSITION USED IN MARITIME OPERATIONS.

Name: PLACE ACTIVITY
Explanation: DESCRIPTION OF THE ACTIVITY OCCURRING AT A PLACE, INSTALLATION OR FACILITY. REF: STANAG 2439, AINTP-3.

Name: AIRCRAFT REPOSITION ACTIVITY
Explanation: THE ACTIVITY PERFORMED TO REPOSITION AIRCRAFT.

Name: ASW TASK
Explanation: DEFINES THE ASW OPERATION THAT THE UNIT IS ENGAGED ON.

Name: SIGHTING ACTIVITY TYPE
Explanation: A DESCRIPTION OF REPORTED ACTIVITY OBSERVED DURING TASKED MISSION, CODED.
